Those involved in negotiating the agreement are Ukraine, Russia, Turkey and the UN, and all parties agree that new arrangements can be made at the end of the winter. So far, more than 11 million tonnes of grain have been exported from Ukrainian ports since July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Every year, thousands of teenagers from across Europe watch three nominated films

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: and select a winner for the Young Audience Award.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's an official category of the European Film Awards, which will be held in Reykjavik on the 10th of December, rewarding the best of European cinema.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The winner this year is Animal, directed by Cyril Dion, a French writer, director and environmental activist.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We invite young people between 12 and 14 year olds to watch three nominated films, three different films from over Europe, and Cyril Dion's film Animal was one of them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They watch the films, they meet in advance to the day of the Young Audience Award, and then on one day, a month before the other European Film Awards, the young people of Europe already vote about their favourite film. And this is the Young Audience Award.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In Animal, Cyril Dion and two teenagers, Bella and Fipulan, meet with scientists and activists from around the world in search of an alternative way of living alongside other species as cohabitants rather than predators.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The winner was chosen by young jurors in 42 European countries watching the films online as well as over 60 movie theaters in more than 70 European cities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's a project that has grown, especially also in the time that screenings were only possible online.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It was much easier to reach a lot of young people that could not come to the cinema.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And actually now for them it feels much more natural to either go to the cinema or still watch the films online.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Animal and the other two nominated films, Comedy Queen from Sweden and Dreams Are Like Wild Tigers from Germany, can be seen on Young Audience Awards website.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The other European Film Awards will be presented in Reykjavik on December the 10th.
